name: Idle Mobster
description:
Idle Mobster is an idle game inspired by old school mafia text based browser games.

By doing criminal activities you can increase your rank and earn money to buy businesses that gives you passive income.

Do you have what it takes to become the Capo di tutti capi?

This game was mostly made as a hobby project to learn the javascript framework, Vuejs. The scope of the game is currently not determined, but I have several functions planned:

- Organised crime: Multiplayer or bots?

- More complex management functions for properties/businesses

- Drug dealing

- Cities (drug prices will vary from city to city, and flying to another city can reduce heat etc)

- Domination, every city has its own map with 10 plots you can take over

- Kill function for bots

- Missions (i.e. "Kill this bot from the hitlist, rewards money")
